Name: fava bean production | fava bean | EN15804GD, U
Category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/011:Growing of non-perennial crops/0111:Growing of cereals (except rice), leguminous crops and oil seeds
Description: Production of faba bean includes farm practices from tillage, seeding, fertilizer application, rolling, herbicide application, fungicide application, harvest aid application, harvesting, and other field operations, to aeration and drying.
